Articles.Content: Hi there. If anyone remembers me, I'm coming back after a 3 month leave from KSP and this here amazing community. I'm glad to be back and hopefully I'll be welcomed with open arms.

Hello Kaboom! I (and many others, I'm sure) remember you. Welcome back.

The community tends to be very welcoming in my experience.

Happy landings!

Hello Kaboom! I (and many others, I'm sure) remember you. Welcome back.

The community tends to be very welcoming in my experience.

Happy landings!

You guys haven't changed. I'm glad that you guys welcome me back.
I do remember you. I'm glad you're back. Zekes just rejoined, too. All the good people are coming back!
Welcome to the forums Kaboom, enjoy your stay with the community!
